ComicInfo.Title: The Long Road Home
ComicInfo.Summary:
After the Apocalyptic events of "from the Ashes (AOD #'s 1-4) Ash is reunited with Sheila as the two set out to remake the world and reclaim the legacy of humanity. How can Ash possibly screw this up? Oh, just you wait.... It all starts here in Ash's "Long Road Home"!
Featuring another stunning script by James Kuhoric and co-writer Mike (Marvel's Zombie, Savage Tales) Raicht, awesome art by Fernando Blanco and sure-to-be coveted covers by Arthur Suydam (75%) and a vicious variant chance cover by Fabiano (Marvel Zombies vs. the Army of Darkness) Neves, this is destined to be THE most talked about AOD series yet!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 20:03:28. [Issue ID 543431]
